title: Executive Order 1786-Temporarily Withdrawing From Public Domain Certain Lands in the State of Arizona
content: Under the authority of act of Congress approved June 25, 1910 (36 Stat., 847), and on the recommendation of the Secretary of the Interior, the public lands in Township 41 North, Range 2 West, Gila and Salt River Meridian, Arizona, are hereby temporarily withdrawn from settlement, location, sale, or entry, for the purpose of classifying said lands, and pending the enactment of legislation for the proper disposition thereof;
Provided: That this order shall not supersede, nor in any wise affect Departmental orders including a portion of said lands within the boundaries of the Kaibab Indian Reservation.
citation: Woodrow Wilson, Executive Order 1786-Temporarily Withdrawing From Public Domain Certain Lands in the State of Arizona Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276631
